body.p: Which one of the following best describes digitization of sound?

multiple_choice.choice: Many times per second, convert the signal into a number representing red, green, or blue.
Many times per second, convert the signal into a number representing the difference between this signal and another music signal.
Many times per second, convert the signal into a number representing the signal's distance from the midline.
Many times per second, convert the signal into a number representing the difference between the left and right channels.

response.feedback: Digitization does convert the signal, but not to colors.
Digitization does a conversion to a number, but not between two signals.
Digitization measures the value of the signal many times per second.
Digitization does a conversion to a number, but not between left and right channelts.
